name: Tunalic
text:
I work for a real estate development company in Birmingham and we had a private event that required valet. I admittedly called a competitor first, but after leaving several unanswered messages decided to reach out to Magic City Parking. These guys answered quickly and were very professional.

After the information was relayed I received a quote via email and we proceeded with the agreed amount. One of the owners and two of his workers showed up a few minutes earlier than they said they would and got everything set up. They worked our event smoothly efficiently. The business owner even stayed the entire time.

John and Patton (owners) were great to work with and I was very satisfied with these guys. With no complaints from our guests and a smooth event, I will be using them again in the future and would not hesitate to recommend them to others.

name: Misty Joseph
text: First Class! Incredible night thanks to this group. Was very professionally dressed and wore a smile all night long. Even in the rain, they managed to continue their great work. Was greatly impressed with the service and timely manner in which they worked. Would recommend them for any event!

name: Whitney Butler
text: Patton and his team are extremely professional and were great to work with! They were on time and the communication up until the event was wonderful! The valet guys went out of their way to help assist our guests needs and I couldn't be more pleased with their service. We will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Chelsea Kennedy
text: If you are looking for a way to elevate your next event, you’ve found it! I worked with Magic City Parking this weekend, and they were professional, efficient, and friendly. As a wedding planner, I am all about the logistics and event flow, and this team of valets made everything run smoothly for guests from start to finish. I highly recommend Magic City Parking Systems!

name: Tunalic
text:
I work for a real estate development company in Birmingham and we had a private event that required valet. I admittedly called a competitor first, but after leaving several unanswered messages decided to reach out to Magic City Parking. These guys answered quickly and were very professional.

text: Patton and his team are extremely professional and were great to work with! They were on time and the communication up until the event was wonderful! name: Chelsea Kennedy
text: If you are looking for a way to elevate your next event, you’ve found it! I worked with Magic City Parking this weekend, and they were professional, efficient, and friendly. As a wedding planner, I am all about the logistics and event flow, and this team of valets made everything run smoothly for guests from start to finish. I highly recommend Magic City Parking Systems!

name: Beth Wright
text: They were so wonderful to work with! Very friendly and so helpful! Very knowledgeable and willing to make everything perfect! We are repeat customers and  will definitely use them again if formal wear is needed!

name: Oreo woods
text: I am so pleased with the tuxedo my son rented for his prom!  It was the perfect fit and he looked amazing!  I haven't found another store in town that could come close to the price of the tuxedo either.  We will be back!!!!

name: Jill
text: Beware of a change in rental return. They don’t go by what’s written on the original ticket. After my son’s prom, he did say it was due back between 12-2 Sunday. Their store isn’t even open Sundays! So I checked the original paperwork and it read due Monday. So the. I get charged $20 on top of the $160 already paid!  Btw no shoes included!!  What a rip off! I spoke to the manager and her claim was a yellow card was included, I told each and every one. What happened to customer service?!? Check around before you rent her and be wary of a change in co tract. Their no good for their ‘word’ even when it’s in writing!

resp.text: Hi Jill, We are sorry for the miscommunication. Your son was correct that we required tuxedos to be returned last week on Sunday between 12-3pm. This is not our normal hours of operation but due to high demand we are sometimes forced to add an extra day to our work week. If you have any other questions please reach out to us at 256-766-6214

name: Sherrie Behel
text: We had to change our venue for my daughters wedding reception due to CDC Covid-19 regulations.  Ended up in a gym but Party Pros came through and made it a fairytale venue!  Everyone involved was super nice and so helpful!!! If we ever need a rental service again, I’ll definitely choose them!  Highly recommended.

name: hazey daze
text: The super short owner Jackie hendrix  is disgusting the way he treats his employees will never recommend to friends and family

name: Sherry Campbell
text: Jackie Hendrix is not only the ultimate professional, he is just a really nice guy.  We called him at 4:00 pm the day for our Dickens Festival.  It was about to be rained completely out. Jackie very calmly laid out festival in an indoor facility and texted me the schematic so I could look at it while we talked.  He brought his team of professionals in and in less than 12 hours had us a tent set up with sides, heaters and lights.  He also decks my brothers homes out in Christmas lights every year and they are beautiful.  I have worked with him on 2 weddings and there is no one any better.

name: Georgia Bivens
text: The dinnerware was fine and as pictured. Their tablecloths have yellow stains on them. We rented a tent in case of rain for an outdoor wedding. I would not recommend the tent.  It was worn, ripped and dingy. I ordered the tent based on what they had pictured but it was nothing like was pictured on their website. They do not respond to your complaint either. Not once has the manager reached out to me.

name: Terra Butler
text: Staff friendly & knowledgeable, some more helpful than others. Quick service. Did not call when order was ready & did not return messages. Fair prices.

name: Leanna White
text: So far too date I have used Party Plus for my grand opening at our business, all three of my children's weddings and every Thanksgiving and Christmas dinners my family has!!! Amazing people!!! Thank you from the entire family!!

name: Joseph Patrick
text: Took my sons money and gave nothing in return. Told manager I was going to call BBB and she laughed and said go ahead. Neither me or my family will use for school functions or weddings down the road

name: Kim Tucker
text: Very poor service and not very apologetic for their mistakes. Would not recommend

name: Danny Mitchell
text: Great place to do business!   They do what they say they will do and on time.

name: Heather Landers
text: Very professional and helpful

name: Cayden McCormack
text: Great place

name: Beth Wright
text: They were so wonderful to work with! Very friendly and so helpful! Very knowledgeable and willing to make everything perfect! We are repeat customers and  will definitely use them again if formal wear is needed!

name: Danny Mitchell
text: Great place to do business!   They do what they say they will do and on time.

name: Heather Landers
text: Very professional and helpful

name: Cayden McCormack
text: Great place

name: Jason Lovoy
text: I continue to rely on Rob and his team and have yet to be disappointed -- Always professional and always delivers on time. From custom banners for events, to signage at our office and even labels from time to time.

resp.text: Thanks Jason! We love the variety of projects and the referrals you have sent us over the past few years.

name: Anne Cole
text: Cheerful and professional service. Great product knowledge with lots of options to fulfill your needs.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words!

name: Ray HOWARD
text: Awesome! Great work!!

name: Rick Dykes
text: I’ve seen the work Rob and his staff do. It’s incredible. From giant printed banners for sporting events to the tiniest detailed custom laser engraved logo work to custom made redwood signs for a university - every single thing they do is top notch. When it’s time to get your graphic done work with CSE.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the accolades, Rick.  We enjoy all the work we are blessed to do each day!

name: Donna Eads
text: They went above and beyond to help me out!! My daughter is a senior and has missed out on so many “senior moments” due to the quarantine, and when I asked Rob to help me with a “Bama Bound” sign for my yard he had it ready for me the next day!!  I would definitely call on them again!!!  They were great!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Donna. We were happy to make a sign to announce her fall destination!

name: Jenifer Burke
text: Super friendly folks with amazing service! I needed a very small job and they treated it with the professionalism and care of a long time customer from start to finish. They make nice stuff!

name: Jacob Holladay
text: CSE to the rescue! I ordered signs from another sign shop and found out when I went to pick them up they had not even been started. A friend told me about CSE Graphics so I cancelled the order at the other place and CSE Graphics got everything done in time for my event. I will use them from now on. Great price and great service!

resp.text: Thanks so much Jacob for the kind words and trusting us with your event signage. We look forward to working with you on your next event!

name: ANDRE HALSTON
text:
At Flipbama we pride ourselves on creating 5 & 6 Star experiences in our Houses to Homes. We only work with companies that share in that same philosophy and found it in CSE Graphics. Candor & Integrity through every step of process. Fabulous job in helping us to build our brand together through their their artwork on our Traveling-Trailer.
They can be trusted to stand alongside their products.
6 STARS ******

resp.text: We really enjoy what we do and customers like you make what we do so rewarding. Thank you so much for the accolades. We sure look forward to the next project we get to take care of for you.

name: Daniel Pahos
text: For over 20 years, CSE Graphics has been our preferred choice for my company's sign and graphics needs. From banner stands to car wraps, logo backdrops to wall logos, CSE has proven to be superior in both quality and service. Even in a pinch, they deliver. Rob and his team are dedicated professionals at what they do.

resp.text: Thanks Dan! We sure appreciate all the projects you have sent our way over the years and the loyalty you have shown us over that time. We sure enjoy working with your team.

name: Tulley O'Malley
text: Great service and my banners looked great! I got my graphics in a timely manner and they were packaged so well I don’t think the shipping process could have damaged them even if they were trying to!

resp.text: Tulley, Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us.  We sure look forward to working with you again on your next project.

name: Nick Mobley
text: Did an amazing job with Ransom’s graphics.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review. We love what Jeremy is doing with Ransom! Keep changing lives. God is Great!

name: Breanne Davis
text: Very professional! Great work on the RANSOM graphic!

resp.text: Breanne, Thank you for your kind review! We love what Ransom is doing in people's lives for Christ. So glad we can help

name: Joshua Watkins
text: Fantastic banner and flags! These guys make it really easy to do business with and they do great work!

resp.text: Thanks so much Joshua for the accolades and for the continued business you have sent our way!

name: carlie shively
text: Top notch company with elite services. Thanks for helping with Next Level!

resp.text: Thanks so much Carlie,  We love everything happening with Next Level!

name: Next Level Sports Camps
text:
Excellent company! The staff is very knowledgeable and has a great heart for serving the community! Go see them today!
-Jeremy Towns

resp.text: Thanks so much, Jeremy.  We sure enjoy working with you and providing signage for your event.  Our community is so blessed by the work you are doing.

name: Barkley Boris
text: I am so unhappy.  I ordered mailbox numbers, paid for them over the phone, and after 2 weeks of waiting did not receive them.  When I called to find out where they were the response was, "well, we sent them to you."  No offer to help figure out why they hadn't been received.  When I asked if they could resend them I was told I would be charged full price again.  I work for a business that has signs made frequently, and I will make sure we use a company with better customer service in the future.

name: Vince Maggio
text: This place really has done some great work, when you walk in you realize that this is no ordinary graphics shop. This is not another cut and paste sign shop but a custom design and graphics candy store

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. We have had a lot of fun working on all the different props for your photo booth business. Can't wait to see what you bring us next.

name: Justin Hardy
text: Rob and his team wrapped my drone with our Switch logo. It turned out even better than I had imagined!!! Thanks CSE GRAPHICS!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks, Justin!  We enjoyed the opportunity to wrap your drone.  I was excited for you to see how it turned out.  Thanks for giving my team the freedom to come up with such a cool branding idea for your drone.

name: Rodney Fulmer
text: Outstanding quality, kept to expected schedule with service beyond expectations.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words. Our team works very hard to make sure every customer can say this, so your review will be very encouraging to them.

name: Courtney Evans
text: Great place with very helpful sales ladies. The only place I go to for my sign needs

resp.text: Thanks, so much for your loyalty.

name: Derek Collins
text: Experienced professionals who genuinely care about the quality of product they deliver. Thank you very much again!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words.  Our staff works very hard to make sure every customer feels as you do.  Looking forward to working on your next project.

name: Glen Jacobson
text: Great job on our trucks at Swimming Pool Services. Highly recommend CSE Graphics.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words.  Our team really works hard to make sure our clients value us as much as we do them.

name: Michael Weber
text: CSE did a fantastic job for me!  I won't use anyone else to print my signage.

resp.text: Thanks so much Michael!  We are looking forward to helping out with your next project.

name: The Fing
text: I had a banner made at another shop but the only person who does grommets was out, and since I needed it right away I called CSE. Bethany put in my grommets while I waited and she didn't charge me. I will take all my sign and printing business to CSE. Thank you!

name: Tracy Tindle
text: I needed a quick temporary sign and CES came up with a solution and installed in 24 hours!!  Top rate!!

resp.text: Thanks for the opportunity to show you how much we value you as a client.

name: Harry Stribling
text: Janiee was fantastic to work with! Really glad to hear that some changes have been made at the top. I imagine the employees who made that place successful are glad to have some new bosses.

name: Jessica Kohn
text: I have used Pre Events for many work events and they are fantastic. All of their staff is great and easy to work with. Items are delivered on time and in great condition!

name: Fountainview Mansion
text: I have really enjoyed working with Janiee and Katie.  They are very professional, kind spirit, and timely with their information.  The staff is always very professional while on site and delivery and set up service are top-notch!  Thank you!   Leigh Hardy. Fountainview Mansion

name: Skylar Albritton
text: I worked with Mary Louise on a styled shoot in Auburn in August 2016. She set up everything so that it was so easy for me. I showed up for pick up, gave them my account number, they loaded my car + I was set to go. Drop off was as much of a breeze + their farm table + ghost chairs were perfect for my fun bridal shower shoot. Every member of their staff was friendly + helpful. Plus, their rentals photographed BEAUTIFULLY.

name: Chad Cleveland
text: Great service and awesome equipment.  highly recommend for event rental in Auburn/Opelika.

name: Wayne Hobbs
text: Most of the security lights don't work

resp.text: Hi Wayne!  Thanks for letting us know,  but we don’t actually offer security lights as part of inventory or services. Please give us a call if you’d like to discuss, as we’d be glad to help resolve if we can.

name: Katherine Carlisle
text: Ok

name: Derek Tucker
text: Awesome customer service

name: James Lindsay
text: All Pro - All the time!  :)

name: Extra Josh
text: Very friendly staff. Book all your gigs through these guys!

name: Joseph Stapleton
text: Seriously one of the best places I've worked. Love the atmosphere and the people.

name: Brenda Brown
text: This company has all you need for stage sound and lighting. Great ppl. Great staff.

name: larry wade
text: Good people always there when I need them

name: A. Lee Abbett Sr.
text: Some of the most talented production people on the planet

name: john bolter
text: Great place to work for

name: lynda johnson
text:
This is the most caring, compassionate group of professionals I've ever come into contact with while making arrangements for my dad.
Completely explained every detail of his prepaid policy, what to expect at the service.
One thing stood out the most and my family will never forget this.
We were telling a story about how my dad loved, I mean love pringles snack pack chips, he would hide them under his hat and in his pants pockets and go to his room with them at night.
Well, unbeknownst to me and my family,  the day of his service they had brought out a beautifully framed photo of pringles chips inscribed with in loving memory.  This touched our hearts in more ways than you could imagine.  Not only did they show us compassion during our time of need, they actually listened to our stories and made our day more bearable.
Kudos to Mobile Memorial Gardens

name: Chad Buckhalter
text: I can’t say enough good things about Mobile Memorial Gardens, they were very caring and compassionate during our time of grief. The people especially were so understanding, patient and very attentive to our needs. The facilities and the service was very nice, I would highly recommend them.

name: Donna laws
text: Clay Thomaston made my experience dealing with my sweet mother’s passing one that i will  always remember. The one thing I dreaded most was sitting at the funeral home discussing her arrangements. Clay has a calmness he brings to the table, he’s  patient and was very supportive of my thoughts and wishes. I would highly recommend Mobile Memorial Gardens for their loved ones arrangements.

name: Denise Stringer
text: Staff are caring, considerate and attention to detail was impressive. I could not have asked for better for my loved one.  Martin and Doris were extremely kind and helpful in every aspect. Elizabeth has reached out to us as well to offer her support and give words of encouragement. Loss is never easy but it was calming to know my mother was in such wonderful hands.

name: Steve wilstrup
text: Mobile Memorial Gardens provided caring and compassionate assistance at a very difficult time. Everyone I encountered was very professional and extremely kind and  I would highly recommend them when you have to deal with the passing of a loved one.

name: Nancy Self
text: Very professional, compassionate and accommodating staff. Exactly what my family needed at the time of our sister’s death.

name: Sharon Knowles
text: Memorial Gardens have been in my family since 1956. We feel love and support from the staff. We feel like they are our family. Thank you for helping us during difficult times. Sharon Knowles.

name: Dale Faulkenberry
text:
The services provided by the Director and Staff were exceptional. Sy Runnels assisted me and my Family in each and every way. His kindness and constant attention was amazing. He attended our Family as if it were his own. With little doubt, Sy helped make a very sad and difficult time easier with his guiding and gentle ways. We are forever grateful for his help.
Dale Faulkenberry

name: Crystal Naylor
text: Mobile Memorial Gardens did a wonderful job with my Dad's services. Although the Corona Virus was in full effect they found a way for us to have services anyway. They were all very respectful and super nice. Martin has the calmest most reassuring voice. It kinda puts you as ease amongst all the chaos ypur going through. I highly recommend them!

name: Terri Leach
text: Would highly recommend Mobile Memorial Gardens. Sy and the rest of the staff were very compassionate and very helpful working out plans for our mother’s service, which was an unexpected event we weren’t prepared for. They helped us with all the details we might otherwise overlook.

name: Lisa Callahan
text: I was completely satisfied with Mobile Memorial Gardens! They did a fantastic job with my mom's funeral. They even sent me a text 3 weeks after we layed my mom to rest just to check on me to see how I was doing! I was so happy with them, my husband and I just put money down on our burial plots!

name: Julie Hatcher
text: This is the second time I have had a loved ones funeral at Memorial Gardens. Couldn’t ask for a better group of people. Everyone was friendly and helpful. The day of the service I was greeted immediately and every need was taken care of with a smile. The beautiful portrait of my Mom will be treasured forever. After the grave side service I went back to get flowers and personal items. They were all neatly loaded on a rolling cart which they rolled out for me and helped me load my car. I’ve had several very sweet follow up calls and text.

name: Dwain Barnes
text: My family and I recently suffered the loss of our infant granddaughter. We were so devastated. Mr. Sanders and his staff at Mobile Memorial Gardens were so compassionate and helpful in helping us with all the arrangements. Their professionalism was amazing but their caring and kindness went beyond even that. We highly recommend them and their services.

name: Daniel Collier
text: Knowledgeable staff, caring, walked us through the process

name: Will Thompson
text: The entire staff at Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home and Gardens are awesome ! They were courteous and attentive and handled everything with dignity and care ....Thank You !

name: Gina Pollock
text: Seamless. Everything was taken care of in such a caring manner.

name: Kay Ortiz
text: The folks at MMG made a difficult time easier to go through. They were genuinely kind and accommodating. The extra touches as thank you cards and beautiful portrait of my brother we’re unexpected. They had social distancing practices in place so we were not fearful of catching the virus. I highly recommend this place for a resting place for your loved ones. Thanks Elizabeth, Eddie and all other employees.

name: Wesley Pamplin
text: Sy Runnels, with the help of the crew at Mobile Memorial Gardens, handled my wife’s memorial beautifully! I wasn’t sure if I wanted to stay with them until Sy stepped in, and I’m so glad I did. Everything was taken care of, and I have some wonderful mementos that I was pleasantly surprised to receive. They have even checked on me afterwards just to see how I’m doing. I wasn’t sure customer service like that still existed!

name: Sheila Midgette
text: Our family received the utmost respect & care on the day of my father’s funeral.  Martin Powers assisted us in the planning process prior to the funeral & he made several good suggestions.  He also set up military honors for my father. Our experience with Mobile Memorial Funeral Home will make them our choice next time our need arises

name: Tara Trammell
text: Everyone who works here showed compassion when my husband passed away! They were caring and sensitive about my needs and those of the family, too!  I was always informed about everything that was happening along the way. The lines of communication were always open. I would highly recommend Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home in your time of need.

name: Linda Wesch
text: Thank you, Mobile Memorial Gardens,  for helping me and my family through this traumatic time!

name: Sherrilyn Wilson
text: I and my family are so grateful to all the staff at Mobile Memorial Gardens for the wonderful job they all did to help us through the difficult loss of my brother. The amazingly tender and sensitive care they gave to all of us was incredible. I highly recommend MMG to anyone suffering the loss of their loved ones, I do believe they will not regret it.

name: Charles H (Gonzo Photog)
text: Very nice folks, did their work with the respect and dignity you’d expect.

name: Ben Andrews
text: We had a great experience here such caring an concerned people an the make sure all your needs are met an you get great service thank you Martin powers for all your help to make our experience the best it could

name: John Henderson
text: Professional, timely and responsive to clients and the funeral process.

name: Dianne Jordan
text: I can't say enough about the caring, compassionate service my family received from Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home. My mother passed in 2017 and my father in June 2020. The staff took care of everything as far as guiding me in what needed to be done. My parents had pre-arrangements in place and that was a huge comfort, financially but most importantly emotionally. I can remember my mother talking about how helpful and friendly the staff were when she and my father were making their arrangements. It felt as if my family was part of the Mobile Memorial Gardens' family. Even down to little things such as holding and caring for the flowers and plants until I could get back there to pick them up. Little things, but those small acts of kindness make all the difference in the world. I am currently starting the process of taking care of my pre-arrangements. There is no one I trust more than Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home.

name: Cindy
text: Everyone was so helpful and attentive during the whole funeral process. It made a difficult time easier for my entire family. I felt that the staff truly cared while, at the same time, was very professional from beginning to end.

name: Amy Walker
text: Lovely mortuary and very convenient having one on the grounds of the cemetery.  We (unfortunately) had to recently bury two of my family members there, both of whom used the funeral home and were given very respectful treatment.  I will eventually be buried here as we own plots in the cemetery and hope we will be also able to use their services.  Hopefully not for a VERY long time since right now we could only afford burlap sacks at this point! :D

name: Martin Dorsett
text: The celebration of life for our Mother was wonderful. I am thankful for Mobile Memorial Gardens Funeral Home and their staff for all they did to make it possible. Martin and John went above and beyond the call. Every detail was attended to in a compassionate and professional way.

name: Wanda Brown
text: Everyone genuinely cared about us during this difficult/emotional time. I would highly recommend Mobile Memorial Gardens to take care of your loved ones when the time comes.

name: Danyell Stewart
text: Sy and his staff made a very difficult time easier than I imagined. He walked us through step by step. Listened to us talk about our beautiful Granny and how we could honor her. He listened and made sure that every detail and every request was met and exceed our expectations!! Thank you is not enough when someone becomes an “angel “ 💕🙏🏻☺️

name: Dee Burrow
text: Mobile Memorial Gardens have the most thoughtful and caring staff that our family has delt with. From beginning to end they met every need and expectation. Even weeks after they where calling to check on our family to see if there was anything further they could do to help us in our transition. We would recommend Mobile Memorial Gardens to all our friends and family who would  like a facility that leads you though your transition with professionalism and care.

name: Phyllis Ducote
text:
Mobile Memorial Gardens is a wonderful place to go in the time of need.   The staff is very helpful and really is concerned about every detail. It was a good experience and everyone who attended my husbands funeral said what a great job they did.   They felt they may use Mobile Memorial Gardens in the future.

Thank you

Phyllis Ducote

name: Terri McNellage
text:
Worked with Sid on our mother's recent funeral arrangements.  He was great to work with and helped us walk through the process. My parents had pre-arranged their funerals in 1993 and things were different then however he worked it all out and completed our funeral needs as written.  Memorial Gardens Funeral Home honored the written policy (However, Memorial Garden Cemetery didn’t do the same - they were one company in 1993 but now they are two totally different companies) The Funeral Home stood by the prearrangements from 1993. however the Cemetery did not. But thankfully the Funeral home stepped up and covered the difference when the Cemetery tried to charge us over and above the prearrangements written agreement. Buyer beware!
Sidney again was great to work with in person, by phone, text and/or email (even over a holiday)

The day of the service everyone was very helpful and respectful of our needs and assisted us in doings things the way our mother would have wanted.

Thank you Sid for your kindness and understanding!

Thank you for the time and concern you gave us during this time.

name: Jabe Fincher
text: this is a nice cemetery. Well kept and nice staff people.

name: Jack S
text: Cemetery charges $6700 seem legitimate. Funeral home charges about$10,500 seem excessive. Total over $17,000. For a modest funeral. I feel like I was taken to the cleaners by a used car dealer.

name: Riley Brenes
text: Funeral homes are notoriously underhanded. Everyone knows someone who has been manipulated into ridiculous costs while grieving. Apparently additions abound when it comes to closing the casket on life. Surprisingly, I didn’t feel pressured into anything or swayed or even the slightest swindle from Memorial Gardens to spend. There I was-  a 32yr old, young father, barely  getting my “adulting” abilities in check when suddenly, I found myself having to navigate the funerary process solo for my late grandmother. Thankfully; Buffy, Nick, and Elizabeth at MG made it simple, affordable, and exactly how my uniquely particular grandmother would have wanted it. I’m thankful for their help and recommend MG to everyone. In the midsts of the fly-by-night funerary groups in town, there is a reason MG has been under the same management for decades: they sincerely care about families and it shows in the way they do business. Truly a blessing to Mobile County.

resp.text: Our passion to help those in need is why we get up every day and help families like yours.  We truly appreciate your trust in us to care for you and you loved one through this process.

name: Jenny Ruhberg
text: My father had his funeral yesterday and I can’t say enough what a wonderful job they did. It’s a beautiful place and all the people there are truly amazing. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

name: martyloper
text: The staff was so thoughtful and caring ❤

name: Kim Murray
text: Julie was so helpful to us in our time of need as we helped our children plan services for their sweet Baby Kellynn Kate. Julie was so understanding and did all she could to help us plan the services as quickly as possible. Through all of this every single person was so caring.

resp.text: Mrs.Murray, thank you for your kind words and trust in the care we provided. We at Mobile Memorial Funeral Home, strive to serve each and every family as if they are our own. We are truly grateful for your feedback — it was our honor to assist you and your family.

name: Sharon Long
text: Visited a wake for a old friend. The place is beautiful and peaceful.

name: Michael Peaden
text: Very nice place to have funeral services at !

name: Larry Bullington
text: 1960 buried my brother Aubrey Bullington

name: Cody Nathan
text: I have had a great experience working with this company and I have learned a ton! I like the mentor style approach, it's been very beneficial to our growth!

name: Shakyya James
text: Worst company I've ever worked for. They are very unprofessional in all aspects.. They scam you when it comes to your check. And if you choose to persue employment be aware of the liars within the company including the owner jennifer Lyon and April kralik.. I was supposed to receive my check a month ago. Whom of which i still havent recieved. Because Jennifer decided that she didnt want to pay me. She has continually given me the run around about my wages. They also sent me on a business trip for what was supposed to be 2 weeks but unexpectedly returned me home with no communication about not returning to the trip. This company is a joke. I'm not here to bash anyone but I wish someone would have warned me before I was subjected to this foolishness.

resp.text: We are very sorry to hear about your experience with us. We strive to provide a positive experience to all who interact with our team. We offer goal-orientated career opportunities for all who join our team and are sorry that our career opportunities did not align with your professional goals. We would love to resolve any issues you have, please email our Human Resources Department via email at hr@vitalityconsultinginc.com. Thank you.

name: Walter Frazier
text: Great customer service with a warm atmosphere, but do call backs.

name: Jon Mann
text: The owner Jennifer Lyons is a lying *****. Terrible company to work for. Pyramid scheme do not trust anything. You work hard and never get promoted. The pay is terrible as well.

name: Jessica Turner
text: Tina and her team were amazing to work with and worth EVERY PENNY! After our consultation, my mom and I were very impressed with Tina’s experience, professionalism and thoroughness! It was incredibly easy to make our decision to hire her. Throughout the months of planning, Tina was always a phone call/ text away and always responded promptly. She made the stress of the Bride (myself) and mother of the bride essentially nonexistent (there’s always a little stress we will feel while planning). Her ideas were consistent with trends, which I appreciated very much. She also had a way of making my dreams for my wedding and my mom’s vision come together to be what we both wanted. On the day of our wedding Tina and her team made the day go seamlessly. She made me feel as if I was the only one who mattered and like I was her own daughter whom she wanted everything to go perfect for. Her idea of the candy/ popcorn bar was a complete hit! My guests are still talking about how they loved it!! Tina and Hannah also did a phenomenal job keeping up with our other vendors and making sure everyone was punctual and improvised when the cake arrived damaged (which I had no idea until the end.. thank goodness). I cannot be thankful enough that our paths crossed and she became our coordinator. The relationship she builds with her customers is something that is true and genuine. You will not regret hiring InStyle Weddings & Events for your big day or special event. Thank you Tina, Hannah, Greg and the rest of the crew for all you did for us.

name: Reds Vibe
text: TIna is the BEST! She calmed every nerve and took care of EVERYTHING. She coordinated every vendor and worked with the venue! Tina made sure everything was covered. It was such a huge help and relief! She suggested amazing vendors and worked well with all of them! The wedding went off without a hitch and Tina was the one who made it happen!! She also has great rentals that helped personalize my wedding, they set everything up and took it all down! SO sweet, professional, and helpful!!

resp.text:
Elaine, it was our absolute pleasure to help you create this beautiful memory that you, family and friends will have for a lifetime.

May God Bless You In Your New Life Together.
InStyle Weddings and Events, Planning and Design Services

name: Karen Terry
text: If you want the most beautiful and stress free wedding, you need Miss Tina. She is so kind, thorough, and professional. She is an amazing wedding planner and a wonderful person.

resp.text: Karen and Scott, this makes me so very happy,  that you are happy. What we always strive to remember is this, this one day in your lives you will always remember for a lifetime,. and I want this to truly be “your Best Day ever”.  Congratulations!

name: Mark W. Douglas
text: Tina Murray is fabulous in her work ethic and attention to detail. She will help your day Shine like you Dreamed it would! Highly Recommend!

name: chattfiremike
text: Tina Murray and her team at In Style Weddings are amazing!!! They were so responsive and accommodating, always providing feedback for any question, big or small, and always went out of their way to make sure everything for my wedding was taken care of. Lecia, my day of coordinator, made sure that all of the décor for the reception was taken care of two days in advance and set everything out-it looked absolutely gorgeous. Everything she did relieved me and my mom of so much day-of stress. Hannah, my bride's assistant, was at my side during all of the pictures before the ceremony, holding my flowers when I needed help with my dress, adjusting my train, pinning my hair back and making sure my veil was in place at all times. She was truly a lifesaver and made it so easy for me to enjoy taking pictures and had everything you could possibly need from bobbie pins, to a mirror, to a glass of water. Tina is extremely honest and straight forward, which I LOVE. I always felt that she had my best interest in mind and would give me the best advice so I could make decisions regarding all aspects of the wedding. I am not from Chattanooga, so I had questions about almost every vendor and she never steered me wrong. She was so much fun to get to know and from the beginning, I felt at ease with her, knowing she was going to be on top of everything for the reception. Since I had a church ceremony, she did not coordinate for that, but she made sure to know all of the details and really took my vision and made it a reality for the entire event. If you are looking for a coordinator, and don't want to spend a fortune, In Style Weddings is the way to go. They do not sacrifice professionalism or quality of service, they are extremely helpful, can fit into almost any bride's budget, and are absolutely worth every penny for the peace of mind they provide! I am so thankful to have had Tina and her team help make my wedding day perfect for my husband and me!

name: Paige Pertuit
text: I cannot say enough nice things about Tina and Lecia. We originally were not going to hire a planner because we thought we had everything under control, but I'm SO glad we did. It saved my mom and I so much stress the day of. Lecia went above and beyond. My wedding would not have been near as great without her. She is so sweet, professional, and really knows her stuff! Thank you for everything!

name: Grace Dyal
text: Great place to have events, like a barn wedding or anything barn related. It is secluded if you want to be left alone.

name: Samantha Casrill
text: AWESOME company!!! Carlos & his staff made my wedding reception the talk of the town! The DJ played the music we requested and did a great job with all of our announcements. The lighting was GORGEOUS & really made the room. I'm so glad we decided to have our wedding cake lit up; it totally made a difference! Everybody loved the photo booth & we have a ton of fun pictures to remember the day! The snow on our first dance really surprised everyone & we even used a really cool picture as our cover photo for our wedding album. Thank you, thank you, thank you!
